text:
Hello team,
I am facing an issue on submitting the app on HubSpot marketplace.

I just updated the name of our existing app but i am getting a new error which i am unable to solve. For your reference i am attaching a screen shot of the error. Kindly help me solve this problem.

Hi Guys,

I hope you are doing well.

I need assistance with the following:

Currently, whenever we uninstall any assets from the Marketplace downloads, the entry remains with an option to reinstall (see attached screenshot).

Can these entries be removed to keep the downloads section clean?

Your assistance in this matter would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,

hello,
i'm trying to listing my app but after reviewing request it returned an error that url path used in app marketplace name is invalid but I'm using the auto generated name appname-appid then I tried to follow the instructions to make it appname-companyname but it still thw same
